! Title: uBlock-Origin-dev-filter – Google+DuckDuckGo – wikipedia
! Expires: 1 day
! Description: Filters to block and remove copycat-websites from search engines. Specific to dev websites like StackOverflow or GitHub.
! Homepage: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter
! Licence: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter/blob/main/LICENSE
!
! GitHub issues: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter/issues
! GitHub pull requests: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter/pulls
*://encyclopedia.thefreedictionary.com/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="encyclopedia.thefreedictionary.com"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$="encyclopedia.thefreedictionary.com"]
*://www.algebra.com/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="www.algebra.com"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$="www.algebra.com"]
*://wikizero.com/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="wikizero.com"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$="wikizero.com"]
*://mediawiki.feverous.co.uk/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="mediawiki.feverous.co.uk"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$="mediawiki.feverous.co.uk"]
*://everything.explained.today/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="everything.explained.today"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$="everything.explained.today"]
*://www.wiwa.wiki/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="www.wiwa.wiki"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$="www.wiwa.wiki"]
*://findatwiki.com/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="findatwiki.com"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$="findatwiki.com"]
*://www.wikide.wiki/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="www.wikide.wiki"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$="www.wikide.wiki"]
*://www.wikit.wiki/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="www.wikit.wiki"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$="www.wikit.wiki"]
*://www.secret-bases.co.uk/wiki/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="www.secret-bases.co.uk/wiki"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$="www.secret-bases.co.uk/wiki"]
*://www.scholarship.edu.vn/wiki/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="www.scholarship.edu.vn/wiki"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$="www.scholarship.edu.vn/wiki"]
*://*.frwiki.wiki/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*=".frwiki.wiki"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$=".frwiki.wiki"]
*://*.zxc.wiki/*
google.*##.g:has(a[href*=".zxc.wiki"])
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain$=".zxc.wiki"]
